thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.dialaflight.com
thread.title: Andy Cannon

author: Andy Cannon
title: Andy Cannon
text: The easiest holiday we've ever booked by far. I asked for a 4 night stay including flights to Amsterdam for the following week and within an hour or so had booked. We were given a choice of hotels depending on budget, went for the best one and was still better value than elsewhere on the web. The hotel, Hilton Double Tree was fantastic, 5 minutes walk from the station, large room and the food was excellent. Will always use Dial a Flight from now, so much easier than spending hours scouring the Internet for the best deals.
